articles.title: FM Nirmala Sitharaman takes on challenge with a simple budget - Economic Times
articles.description: The government has got a two- to three-year free pass on the deficit and can borrow and spend liberally. The economic cost of fiscal deficits will have to be paid but as the last few months have taught us, there are no perfect solutions, only trade-offs.
articles.content: A crisis can make life simple, reducing it to the absolute necessities. Since the coronavirus hit us last year, most activities and complexities of life melted away, postponed to some far away future… [+2358 chars]
